data.ecu_host: ECU IP address (follow connection method table in readme)
data.scan_interval: ECU query interval in seconds (minimum 300 recommended)
data.port_retries: Retries when ECU fails to respond
data.cache_reboot: Cache count before auto ECU reboot (ECU-R-Pro & ECU-C models)
data.show_graphs: Update graphs when inverters are offline
data.wifi_ssid: Specify SSID (ECU-R-Pro and ECU-C models only)
data.wifi_password: Specify password (ECU-R-Pro and ECU-C models only)

error.no_ecu_found: No ECU found at this IP-address or ECU is recovering from restart
error.unknown: Unknown error, see log for details.
